name: QuarantineThings
0:
”Alexa open quarantine things”
”Alexa ask quarantine things to give ideas”
”Alexa tell quarantine things to inspire me”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quarantine things
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Ask for Quarantine Things, and find new ideas of things to do
Quarantine Things provides fun the whole family can enjoy and is guaranteed to make you less bored
To start, just say "Alexa, open Quarantine Things"
At anytime, you can stop by saying "Alexa, stop"
All ideas' credit to: https://www.todaysthebestday.com/50-things-to-do-for-yourself-during-a-quarantine-coronavirus/ https://www.collegemagazine.com/bucket-list-100-things-to-do-when-youre-bored-in-quarantine/
